thread.title: Romy

author: Romy
title: Romy
text: I would never dare leave my home and pets to take vactaions, until I discovered Trusted House Sitters. I have been using them now for one year and a half and I have NEVER had a negative experience. This whole site is put together so well, so you only do what feels right and comfortable and I have been so pleased and grateful! It is a win, win situation for everyone and I am just so grateful to be a part of it, as are my pets! Give it a try, you won't be dissapointed.
